column1: The Purple Pig////For a party of two
column2: we ordered 3 dishes and shared. The servers recommended 2 dishes per person
column3: however since we aren't huge eaters we decided on 3. We ordered the bone marrow
column5: and pork shoulder. This was my first time trying bone marrow and I was not expecting it and did not enjoy it as much as others might've. The octopus was my favourite at around $20 a plate. It wasn't an overly large plate
column6: but it was quite delicious. It has a mix of veggies and sauce and had a good char to it. The shoulder was tender and very soft
column7: but to pair it with mashed potatoes on the bottom seemed like a scoop of mush.
